title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing a dream about a hedgehog in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What you do not know about the hedgehog in a dream and the interpretation of his vision by Ibn Sirin. The hedgehog is one of the small animals listed as mammals. As for dreaming about it, it has many interpretations that we cannot ignore. On an Egyptian website, you will find comprehensive explanations, and they include all types of animals that you see. As for the following lines, we will talk about a complete and detailed explanation of seeing a hedgehog in a dream. A hedgehog in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about a hedgehog by Imam Nabulsi indicates the acquisition of a group of weapons by the dreamer, and seeing it in a dream expresses The priest's damage is caused by magic and goblins cast upon him to distort his life and spread. It's depression. Al-Nabulsi explained that dreaming of a hedgehog means that you are watching people and spying on them to know their secrets. If the dreamer dreams of the thorns of a hedgehog, this means that he is panting in his desires, and then begins to cleanse his sins with various good deeds and repeated worship, with the aim of obtaining forgiveness and satisfaction from most people. . The Most Gracious. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. What is the interpretation of a dream about a brown hedgehog? A hedgehog in a dream means that there is a man in the dreamer’s life who loves money and lives to collect it, and he will remain so until he obtains a great position in wealth, but he does not like to He is in crowds of people all the time, meaning he is an introvert. The dream also indicates that the dreamer is approaching a man with malicious and bad intentions and does not hesitate to harm others. From a promising vision, if a hedgehog appears in a dream, but dies, this means stability of the dreamer’s financial and emotional situation Imam Al-Nabulsi said that if the dreamer sees a hedgehog entering his house, this indicates his good behavior and his knowledge of the righteous and their high morals soon. The hedgehog in a single woman’s dream. The interpretation of a dream of a hedgehog for an unmarried woman confirms that she has fallen in love with a young man, and if she sees that she is raising him in her home, this is interpreted with the same interpretation. Slaughtering a hedgehog in her dream is an indication of her marriage. If an unmarried woman sees that the groom came to her in a dream and went out of her room to talk to him and she found a hedgehog for him, then this dream warns her that a young man will soon come to her to marry her, but he has very bad qualities. The first is stinginess and the second is emotional and reckless. If a girl dreams of a dark black hedgehog, the dream is interpreted that she will leave her lover if she gets engaged. If the hedgehog is white and an unmarried woman sees it in her dream, this means that she will get married and soon she will go to fashion houses to choose her wedding dress that suits her body shape. If an unmarried woman goes to a place designated for selling animals and buys a hedgehog, this is good for her, especially if she buys it while she is happy. Interpretation of a dream about a hedgehog’s thorn: Seeing hedgehog thorns in a dream is bad, but if the dreamer suffers from them, it will be a great evil, but if it is pierced The hedgehog is the dreamer's hand, but it is not hurt much, it means minor evil. This will happen to him and its effect will go away. A married woman said that she saw a hedgehog in her sleep, and the thorns on its back were clean. When she approached him, she found it dirty, so she took it to clean it with water. She said: When you wash

title: Interpretation of seeing fasting in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Fasting in a dream for a single woman. Fasting is one of the duties prescribed by God, and a girl who sees herself fasting is evidence of many acts of worship and good deeds. Fasting in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about fasting for an unmarried woman is one of the good visions that indicate that she has morals and religion and adherence to her legitimate worship and the good conduct that she possesses. If a girl sees in a dream that she intends to fast and displays her intentions, this explains the great goodness and enormous food that she enjoys. Seeing fasting in the dreamer’s dream indicates her hard work, her goal, and the effort exerted to achieve it. Ibn Sirin believes that the dream of fasting is good news in marriage and changing circumstances to The best, whether material or social. Seeing a fasting girl in her dream shows her patience in getting what she wants and adhering to the provisions of her religion. But if she sees herself fasting, this means traveling and moving away from the place where she lives. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds on the online dream interpretation site from Google Fasting in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the fasting of an unmarried woman in her dream indicates the straight path, the creation of distinctive qualities, and the seriousness of religiosity. If you see fasting during Ramadan, this indicates distress and suffering from rising prices, and going through a difficult time. Ibn Sirin explains that Fasting in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her journey to work, gain money or education, and acquire knowledge. A girl who sees in her dream that she is fasting may be a sign that she must avoid making mistakes so as not to fall into disobedience and sins. In general, Ibn Sirin interprets that Seeing the dreamer fasting in her dream indicates great wealth that will come to her. Interpretation of a dream about fasting and breaking the fast in a dream for a single woman. If the unmarried dreamer sees that he is fasting and breaks his fast intentionally, this leads to sin and disobedience to God. Adhering to the rights of her Lord and adhering to the rules and vision of a single woman indicates her fasting for the good news of her marriage to a moral and religious young man. I dreamed that I was fasting. Interpretation of the dream of fasting in a dream in general to good news that expresses the great goodness and nourishment that the dreamer obtains in his life. If a woman sees herself fasting and she is the owner of a business project, this is a sign of the material gains and profits that she will gain from it. As for fasting in general, it is a sign of your obtaining the highest positions and a high status in life, and indicates enjoying a long life and health, and if the dreamer works in the field This is a sign of progress. A dead person fasting in an unmarried woman’s dream. The dream of a dead person fasting in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that her condition will improve, and she will do good and charity and walk on the straight path. News is coming to her and the end of the period of suffering and distress that she was experiencing, and in the case of the girl who saw the dead person while fasting, she is in good condition. Extreme hunger, this indicates his need for alms. Interpretation of a dream about fasting outside of Ramadan for a girl: A single girl’s dream that she is fasting outside of Ramadan is interpreted as making the utmost effort and exerting the greatest amount of energy to achieve a goal.

title: More than 40 interpretations of seeing a dream about vomiting or regurgitation in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing rewinding in dreams, as well as by major scholars. Many questions revolve around rewinding in a dream. Is it a positive sign? Or a sign of doom and gloom? To reassure the dreamers, great jurists such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others were able to provide specific and clear explanations for this vision, and through the distinguished Egyptian website you will find an explanation for all your dreams, so follow the lines below. Back to the dream The vision of vomiting is one of the visions that cannot be interpreted in one sense, so if the dreamer asks Regarding the interpretation of a dream about regurgitation, one will find more than one indication of this vision, and from here we will provide all the evidence so that the reader can benefit; The first sign is especially for anyone who has cried a lot in the past few days because of his fears and complex problems that continued to drain his energy until they became despaired and depressed. The second sign is related to any A dreamer has spent a long period of his life in doctors’ clinics due to illness, but after this dream, he will receive good news of recovery and freedom from the shackles of illness. The third sign belongs to every human being who has spent his life in false worldly matters and is preoccupied with feeling forbidden pleasure and satisfying his desires in any way he likes. Of the sins that he has engaged in, and he will soon be cleansed of them because he will repent of his desire without anyone forcing him to do so. Whoever vomits in his dream will return the money that he took while awake and did not return to its owners. Imam Al-Sadiq. A dream about vomiting sometimes comes in different forms that are strange from vomiting in reality, which means that the dreamer may vomit. In his dream, what kind of honey, whether white or black, and the interpretation of the dream will be that he will choose to study. He studied his religious sciences because he saw them as important and worthy of study, and the vision shows that he not only studied these sciences, but rather aspired to a prestigious religious rank, where he might become close to the jurists and scholars. Specialization in religion. What is the interpretation of a dream of blood flowing? If you ask a married woman about the interpretation of blood flow in a dream, the answer will be in three separate indicators: The first sign, which indicates a great sin and disobedience that was following it, which is living with illicit money, and it should be noted that illicit money comes From multiple sources, and perhaps the dreamer was following one of them, so it is likely that he has. She stole or took money for perjury and her illicit money may have come from trading. Suspicious, but in any case, vomiting her blood in the dream indicates a permanent cessation of earning dishonest money. The second sign is that she is pregnant. Regarding the third sign, it will indicate two sub-signs. The first is related to the reunification and return of the absent person to her family, and the second means finding something that was lost to her for a long time, And the possibility that this thing is among her personal possessions or one of her expensive possessions. Rewind in a dream for single people. This vision in an unmarried woman’s dream means a great compensation that will make her happy, knowing that this compensation can be emotional, financial, or academic. For some reason, and she felt confused and confused because she lost her source of livelihood, God will not leave her confused and make her an employee in a bigger place

title: Interpretation of seeing bricks in a dream

preview.html: It is mentioned that there are houses and properties that are delivered to their owners red bricks before they are fully completed, we can provide different interpretations of this vision for a man, a married woman, a pregnant woman and an unmarried girl to the main commentators. Fire bricks in a dream for Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted fire bricks in a dream as being held with the past and longing for it. He also said that seeing bricks symbolizes building new relationships. It may indicate a successful project that begins with the seer. Whoever dreams that he saw bricks turning into stone is a symbol of unfortunate events. Regarding the patient, whoever dreams that he has turned into a brick announces his death and God does not. Seeing bricks in a dream for a man When a man dreams of them falling from the sky and scattered in different places on the ground after being demolished, it is a symbol of the calamities that have befallen God. Whoever knows the same head, solid fire bricks are a symbol that adheres to his decisions and does not listen to others. Whoever dreams that he is meeting bricks in a dream is a good omen for marriage soon. The meaning of seeing bricks in a single woman’s dream Seeing sitting on bricks in a dream, an unmarried woman is a sign of her marriage to a wise man. As for seeing all The furniture of the house turned into bricks, this means that he will soon go bankrupt. When you dream that I am building my house, the new brick symbolizes her feeling of pride and pride. If she sees that there is someone in her house who hit her with bricks, it is an indication of the calamities that have befallen him. Seeing the collection of bricks shows in her dream that she fears something. Interpretation of seeing bricks in a dream by Nabulsi Ibn Sirin said that seeing bricks in a dream is a symbol of lawful money. He also said that it basically symbolizes the anxiety felt by the dreamer. Whoever sees himself moving bricks from one place to another in a dream indicates that he is going through difficult situations. Seeing silver bricks in a dream is a symbol of recovery from illness. The meaning of seeing bricks in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman for bricks to fall from the sky above her house is a sign of many problems she faces with her husband. Seeing solid bricks in a dream symbolizes that she will give birth to a boy, but he will be harsh on her. Seeing black bricks in her dream symbolizes goodness and a lot of sustenance for her. The meaning of seeing bricks in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing bricks in a pregnant woman's dream indicates that she is pregnant. Her health will be better than it was at the time of the dream. It may indicate the birth of a male. If the bricks are silver, it symbolizes To give birth to a female. Add the dream you want to interpret, indicating the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about an ostrich

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing ostriches in a dream has promising connotations. There are also fears about this vision and its unwanted connotations. In the following lines, we will learn about the different meanings of the dream of ostriches from the most famous scholars of dream interpretation, such as Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. You may also know the dead father in a dream. In reality, ostriches It is a large bird that has the ability to fly, so it is one of the birds that has many indicators when it appears in a dream, but before you begin to explain the visions and interpretations of ostriches in a dream, it should be noted that no interpretation of any vision should be rejected. We will refer to any vision that the dreamer saw only before reviewing it. By the Shariah interpreter, he can identify all the elements of the dreamer so that he can interpret them correctly. The dream. Seeing an ostrich attack in a dream indicates the presence of difficulties and problems facing the dreamer. Seeing ostrich eggs in a dream is evidence that a man will marry a beautiful woman. Seeing a dream of slaughtering an ostrich, this indicates that there is a big problem but it has been solved. Read also: Toilet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an ostrich in a dream. Interpretation Seeing an ostrich in a dream Many dream interpretation scholars believe that the interpretation of seeing an ostrich in a dream for a man generally symbolizes a woman and the qualities that she possesses, and God knows best. Among the most important symbols of ostrich in a dream is inheritance and money acquired, and God knows best. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream Seeing a slaughtered ostrich In a dream, when you dream that you are slaughtering an ostrich, this may be one of the praiseworthy signs that portends comfort and relief from the strife and troubles that the dreamer has suffered from, and God knows best. Like eating ostrich meat in a dream, this is one of the signs of the luxury that the dreamer is experiencing, and God knows best. The captive who sees ostriches in a dream This is good news that he will be released and released, and God knows best. Just like a poor person who dreams of eating ostrich meat, this may be good news for that person that he will become rich soon - God willing - and God knows best. Read also: Washing the dead. Seeing an ostrich in a dream for a manThe man A married man sees an ostrich in a dream, as this indicates the presence of a woman, and God knows best. Also, a married man sees an ostrich in a dream, and this could indicate happiness in living with a woman. A small ostrich in a man’s dream, because this may be one of the signs of his birth, and God knows best. If a person sees himself riding an ostrich, this may be an indication that he will travel in a short time, and God knows best. Seeing an ostrich running in a dream When someone dreams of an ostrich chasing him in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer does not have the ability to quickly pick up the right skills. And God knows best. Just like a person who sees himself running away from an ostrich in a dream, this may be one of the indicators that the dreamer is weak in character and lacks the ability to adapt. Also, feeling intense fear of the ostrich in a dream, this may be an indication of the dreamer’s inability to solve crises. And the problems he faces, and God knows best. Seeing an ostrich attack in a dream. When you dream that an ostrich is attacking the dreamer, this is one of the signs.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the presence of a lizard in a dream?

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing a lizard in a dream: A lizard in a dream is like anything else we see in a dream, sometimes it brings good and sometimes it symbolizes evil, and although the lizard does not harm a person in any way, seeing it in a dream disturbs the dreamer. Horror and anxiety. Through our article, we will explain what it means to see a lizard in a dream? Interpretations of a dream about a lizard. Seeing a lizard in a dream symbolizes the presence of enemies in the dreamer’s life and conspiring evil against the dreamer. Killing a lizard in a dream portends the dreamer regaining his rights and bad luck. The attempt to kill the lizard, its failure, and its escape. Evidence of many conflicts and crises that the viewer will be exposed to in his professional and emotional life. A woman seeing a lizard walking on her clothes, this vision indicates that she is suffering from sadness and worries in her life. A lizard in a dream symbolizes a woman with a fickle mood. If a man sees a lizard in a dream The vision may indicate the woman in his life or that his life will change rapidly during the next period of his life. The dreamer’s dream that a green lizard has bitten him indicates that if the dreamer is sick, he will be cured or God will give him a narrow diet. The green orchid symbolizes recovery from Illness. What does a lizard mean in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Sheikh Muhammad bin Shirin says in his interpretation of seeing a lizard in a dream that if one sees in a dream that the lizard has died, then this person has suffered from tarnishing and losing his reputation, but soon things will return to their state. Of course, it is normal. A lizard in a dream is evidence that the dreamer follows his whims and instincts and thinks a lot about how to achieve his happiness with them, such as marriage, food, and other instincts. Seeing a lizard is evidence that there is a person whom the visionary cannot tolerate, a person who is indifferent to the feelings and emotions of others. Says Ibn Sirin A colorful orchid in a dream says that the dreamer who sees a colorful orchid in his dream has a creative and innovative sense and wants to renew his life permanently. The appearance of an orchid in the workplace, in the company or in the factory, is evidence that the dreamer will face a number of problems and difficulties in his work and it may be A sign that the dreamer will suffer a material loss. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search for the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretive scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a black lizardThe interpretation of seeing a black lizard for an unmarried woman indicates that an evil person will enter her life , but she is far from him and will end this relationship forever. But if one sees a black chameleon biting him in his dream, this is evidence that someone will harm him and will do so with cunning and spite. But if the sign is pregnant, then the black chameleon shows that she is pregnant with a male, then this is good news. Seeing a lizard in a dream. A lizard in a woman’s dream, if it injures her in any way, is evidence of the misfortune that will follow the dreamer, making her go through a period of anxiety and sadness in the coming period of her life. A woman’s lizard scratch in a dream is evidence of an illness that afflicts her husband until death.

title: The most important interpretations of seeing a new car in a dream

preview.html: Buying a new car in a dream. Many interpreters differ about the meaning of buying a car in a dream, but the majority of them believe that it has a good meaning, and in this article we will learn about the interpretation of seeing a car in a dream and what it indicates according to the status of the monarch and his social and psychological condition. Buying a new car in a dream Article Many of the most important interpretation scholars, the interpretation of the dream of buying a new car in a dream indicates that the dreamer will feel a lot of joy and happiness due to the emergence of many happy circumstances in his life during the upcoming menstruation. Many of the most important interpretation experts have confirmed that seeing buying a new car in a dream The dreamer indicates the end of all financial crises that always put him in a bad psychological state in the coming periods. Seeing himself buying a new car in the dreamer’s dream indicates that he collects all his money and wealth through his hard work and diligence and always cares about God in all matters of his life because he fears God. As he said Many prominent interpretation scholars said that the vision of buying a new car in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be able to achieve many wonderful successes in the coming periods that will make him occupy a distinguished position in society. Buying a new car in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that the vision of buying a car A new dream in a dream indicates that the dreamer will meet the girl he longed for and enter into a long love story with him, and this relationship will end with many good things happening. While the great scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing a married woman buying a new car in a dream is evidence of her wise personality, capable of resolving all problems and disputes that arise between her family members and resolving them calmly and wisely without the interference of another stranger from her family. The great scholar Ibn Sirin also confirmed that Seeing yourself buying a new car during a fortuneteller’s dream is an indication that God (Glory be to Him) will open many great doors of life for him that will make him achieve a lot. Of the requirements of his family and they do not need it for anything that they cannot do in the coming periods. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world, just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Buying a new car in a dream for a single woman. Many have confirmed One of the most important interpretation scholars is that seeing the purchase of a new car in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign that she will meet a person with an excellent position in society who will propose to her and live her life together in a state of trust and peace of mind. Seeing that she is also buying a new car during sleep means that she will receive a large inheritance. It would greatly improve her and her family’s standards in the coming periods. Whereas if an unmarried woman sees that she is buying a new car, but its appearance is bad in her dream, this is a sign that she will go through many great experiences that will make her feel tired and suffering in the coming periods. But if she sees The same girl buying a new, beautiful car while she is pregnant indicates that God will...

title: Interpretation of seeing chains in a dream

preview.html: Dream Interpretation to see chains in a dream, chains are iron chains or rings, their mission is to restrict a person or restrict something, but many see chains or restrictions in a dream and are worried about this vision, today we will examine you in detail what are the signs of seeing chains in a dream Seeing chains in a dream indicates religiosity and stability and may indicate the marriage of an unmarried girl. Dreaming of seeing wooden chains indicates the stability of gossip and hypocrisy in reality. Interpretation of a dream about seeing chains in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained the restrictions imposed on the traveler’s vision, indicating the length of his journey and his absence. It indicates Seeing a sick person’s limitations indicates the length of time he has actually spent sick. Seeing a dreamer tied with ropes indicates his steadfastness in religion. Seeing silver chains indicates the stability of marriage in life. Seeing gold ties indicates the return of the thing. Seeing wooden shackles in a dream indicates an obsession with gossip and hypocrisy in life. Reality. Seeing chains in a dream symbolizes enemies. As for seeing broken chains in a dream, it means survival. Interpretation of a dream about seeing chains on the hand in a dream. Seeing a hand in a dream tied to chains, which indicates difficulties in life. A tied hand in a dream also indicates the dreamer’s inability to achieve what he actually wants. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Chains on the leg in a dream: Seeing a tied man in a dream indicates the obstacles that the dreamer will face in achieving what he wants. It is associated with seeing a dead person in a dream, which indicates debts that he could not pay before his death. It also indicates seeing the deceased in a dream, which indicates the extent of his inability. On achieving many things related to his family. Seeing the limits of the dead in a dream also indicates its bad consequences in the afterlife. Interpretation of a dream about restrictions imposed on unmarried women. Seeing restrictions in one’s dream indicates family and social commitment to him in reality. Also, seeing restrictions in a single woman’s dream It means that there are obstacles to achieving her goals. Interpretation of a dream about restrictions imposed on a married woman. Seeing chains in a married woman’s dream indicates psychological discomfort in reality. Seeing restrictions in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is having difficulty adapting to many situations in her life. Seeing chains in a married woman’s dreams indicates her physical or emotional need for him. At the end of this article, we spoke to you in the previous lines with sufficient and comprehensive information about the above topic, which is the dream interpretation of seeing chains in a dream. We wish you dreams full of kindness and happiness, as long as you are in God’s care and care.

title: Interpretation of seeing rocks in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of seeing rocks in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing them in a dream indicates goodness, abundance, and abundance. The viewer will soon receive a financial benefit, but if the dreamer sees that he is flying and throwing pebbles, this indicates hardening of the heart, denial, and many other things depending on the social status and psychological state of the viewer. I mean I see rocks in the dream, the dreamer has many fears, feelings of sadness, tension, and difficulties that he faces. However, if he sees white pebbles in a dream, this is evidence of the many financial benefits for someone close to the dreamer, and this is a sign of kindness and abundance of food. Therefore, if the dreamer sees this, the sky is raining slaps, and it speaks of the challenges and obstacles that the viewer faced during this period, as well as his exposure to many difficulties and pressures. Walking on pebbles in a dream indicates a feeling of failure, then disappointment, despair, and multiple material losses. But if he sees in a dream that he is throwing stones, this indicates denial and hardness of heart, as well as the harshness and danger of relationships. Your vision that you are throwing stones in a dream indicates words Bad about people, unjustified, and gossip. Interpretation of seeing rocks in a dream for a man. Interpretation of dreams. Black rocks. The color in the dream indicates the connection of a righteous girl who is close to our Lord, and who loves religiosity and worship as well. The passage of rocks in a person’s life. The vision indicates exposure to many problems and pressures in life, but they It will pass in a short time. But if a person sees in his dream that he is building it and steps on it in a dream, then the dream shows the fulfillment and fulfillment of desires and goals. Interpretation of a single girl’s vision of throwing stones: It appears in a dream that he has a strong personality, acts wisely, and shows great care when dealing with others. But if she sees She herself collects pebbles in a dream, this indicates that she is close to the Creator, that she is fleeing from the accursed Satan, and that she is standing in worship. As for throwing slips at her in the dream, this indicates the presence of hypocrites, as well as those who hate her and flirt with her. Low slips in the dream of an unmarried woman, This indicates committing sins and disobedience, so she approaches the Creator and repents. Gravel and sand in an unmarried girl’s dream indicate achieving the goals and aspirations that she strives for. Interpretation of seeing a white stone in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a white stone in a dream indicates good luck, success, and success in life. But if He saw in a dream a white rock or a white stone, this indicates the longevity of the fortuneteller and the presence of a new woman in his life. Likewise, white stones in a dream indicate that the goods sold there are cheap and that life is comfortable. The interpretation of a white stone in a dream indicates the high position of the pioneer and the status of prestige. Interpretation of dreams for earthquakes and survival for individuals. Look at the girl about an earthquake. The dream in the dream indicates that she will be exposed to temptation and fall into it and then turn to bad things during her life. The dream about an earthquake also shows a single woman who fails to go to court or breaks up with her lover.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream?

preview.html: The snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin Many people are always looking for an interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream, as this vision is one of the visions that carry many associations and meanings between its aspects, a divorced woman, a man, and others. The snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin's interpretation of the dream of a snake has many different interpretations, which are as follows: When a person sees a snake in his dream, it may be a sign of the presence of a person who has a grudge against him and wishes him harm and evil, and seeing snakes in a dream generally goes to enemies, but the person who sees the snake's crack in a dream shows the worries and problems he suffers from and can be good news. If a person sees a snake and feels afraid after seeing it, this means that there is an enemy of his who has a good position in society and wants to harm and destroy him, and seeing a snake in a dream without fear indicates his extension. The dreamer's livelihood and enjoyment of a life full of goodness and luxury, and when he sees the snake entering the house with him in his dream, this indicates the presence of a person among his relatives who carries hatred and malice in his heart. Seeing a snake in a dream can be good news for the dreamer that he will get more profits and money in the coming period, but if one sees the snake in his dream, this leads to the presence of evil people in his life and the snake without feeling fear leads the dreamer to enjoy many good qualities such as strength and courage. If one sees a black snake in his dream, this means that he suffers from some health problems, and when one sees a green snake in his dream, this indicates an increase in goodness and blessings in his life and seeing a black snake in a dream is a sign of haters and envy. Seeing a snake can be evidence of the presence of some family disputes in the dreamer's life, and when one sees a dead snake in his dream, this is good news that all his aspirations and dreams will come true. From some marital problems soon, God knows best. The snake in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin If an unmarried woman sees a snake in her dream, this means that an evil young man will propose to her soon, and seeing a snake in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of the presence of a charlatan in her life and that person. He will cause her harm and harm, but if an unmarried woman sees a large snake in her dream, this means that there is a person who wants to harm her a lot.
